content.body: Yeah, the main point is that the default IRC port does not work
equalsjeffh: btw port 6679 and 994 provide secure connection. https://www.w3.org/Project/IRC/ has some more info
thanks domfarolino, annevk and timothygu -- it was just the silly port# thing -- its a wonder they let me play with computers....  ðŸ˜œ
